outputs.output_descr: Cross Cutting Advisory Support to GoSS to provide a comprehensive approach to cross cutting issues of gender and conflict sensitive programming, and capacity development across the UNDP Southern Sudan programme

project_descr: The project focuses on: support for capacity strengthening of GoSS and states to deliver and promote mainstreaming of peacebuilding, reconciliation and conflict transformation approaches into programming
project_title: CROSS CUTTING ADVISORY SUPPORT TO GOSS
